item.title: CVE-2024-49323|2024-10-20T07:53:28.670Z -- sourav -- all%20in%20one%20slider
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Sourav All in One Slider allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects All in One Slider: from n/a through 1.1.
